issue.title: [Crossbow] Consider removing artifact patterns
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7619](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7619). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The maintenance cost of artifacts patters for crossbow tasks might not worth the effort.

Pros:
- it provides an extra layer of security for the artifact naming to conform
- we can ensure to have the expected set of artifacts
  
  Cons:
- we often forget to update them, so the arfitacts don't get downloaded during release process
- the uploaded file paths are not checked neither by crossbow.py status nor the ursabot comment bot
  
  cc `[~kou]`
